props.hover: Applies **4dp** of elevation when hovered (default 2dp). You can find more information on the [elevation page](/styles/elevation).
props.image: Apply a specific background image to the component.
props.prependIcon: Prepends a [v-icon](/components/icons/) component to the header

events.click: Emitted when component is clicked - Will trigger component to ripple when clicked unless the `.native` modifier is used
